reuters.title: UNION <UCO> TO SELL UNION FLONETICS UNIT
reuters.body:
Union Corp said it agreed in principle to sell its Union Flonetics Corp subsidiary to Irvin Kaplan, a Houston investor. The unit makes valves and marine specialty equipment for the military. Kaplan is also controlling shareholder of <Hunt Valve Co Inc>. The amount of the cash transaction, expected to close in April, was not disclosed.
Reuter 
